about_the_game:
Aeterna: Rubra Plena is a visual novel otome game about happy romance and dealing with depression, anxiety, and trauma.
The game does not contain toxic relationship dynamics - all love interests will love you for who you are.

The game is set in the world of Thealia, in a magicpunk universe with Persian undertones.
You play as a beautiful young noblewoman dealing with her current and past experiences while finding love.

Features

  • Choose between four gorgeous love interests - three males and one female.
  • Experience happy romantic relationships with a cast that is only interested in you.
  • Customize the heroine's name, and define her preferences as you play.
  • Explore multiple endings per route.
  • Keep track of collected lore, CGs, and endings.

Story


Norelia (renamable) has been pushed into depression due to her past life. Once a social butterfly, she has lost the will to upkeep her previous social life and distances herself from others, seeing them as faceless figures and dolls with strings attached.

That is, until she meets a special someone. She starts to feel emotions she forgot were possible to feel. But her life is about to be turned upside down once again as she is arrested for a crime she did not commit and plunged into the depth of the Astrals, where she now has to fend for herself in a place that despises her very being.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains references to toxic relationship dynamics, depression, and trauma, as well as alcohol usage.
